definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
to beat the gong to clear the way/(fig.) to pave the way for sth

sentences.english: The waiting is over. The World Cup is about to kick off.
sentences.chinese: 漫長的等待終於結束了，南非世界盃即將鳴鑼開戰。

sentences.english: At any rate, the battle lines between Google and Microsoft are now clearly drawn.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，谷歌和微軟已經鳴鑼開戰。
